content: flower center of daisies pansies forget-me-nots and leaves surrounded by white lace scallops doily may be made in any size thread in size 10 doily measures approximately 11 inches diameter requires white blue pink green yellow shaded lavenders tinted lavender and yellow and shaded yellows for maggie weldon s updated version see flower bouquet doily pa652 1 updated with different colors in *meine häkelwelt sonderheft hä061 filethäkeln* and *le monde du crochet* 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/flower-bouquet-doily-pa652
